input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver has chrome/nickel plating for longer life and industrial tool steel bits that are heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, and blast finished for top quality. This Crescent product is a versatile screwdriver that includes one each of interchangeable bits for #1 and #2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver.
input_text.Response B: The Crescent 6-in-1 Screwdriver is an essential tool for any household or workplace. It includes interchangeable bits for no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdrivers. The industrial tool steel bits are heat treated, tempered, and stress relieved for durability and long life. The chrome/nickel plating adds an extra layer of protection and corrosion resistance. This versatile screwdriver is perfect for DIY projects, home improvement tasks, and basic repairs.
